text: Douglas Edward Alexander "Eddie" Gustafsson McIntosh (born 31 January 1977) is a Swedish former football player. He started playing football in 1983 with IFK Stockholm. He played afterwards for IFK Stockholm, IFK Norrköping, Molde FK, Ham-Kam and Lyn Oslo. 2009 he signed for F.C. Red Bull Salzburg. On April 18th, 2010 he was injured severely during the away match versus LASK Linz and took 317 days to recover. ==Honours== ===Red Bull Salzburg=== *Austrian League: 2008–09, 2009–10, 2011–12, 2013–14 *Austrian Cup: 2011–12, 2013–14 ===Individual=== *Goalkeeper of the year (Norway): 2008 *Goalkeeper of the year (Austria): 2010 ==Gallery== File:20100513 Finalspiel Sturm Salzburg DSCN1743 (140).JPG|with the trophy Goalkeeper of the Year 2010 File:Eddie Gustafsson98.JPG|Eddie Gustafsson vs. SV Ried - March 16, 2011 File:Eddie Gustafsson8.JPG|First homematch after his injury versus SV Mattersburg - March, 5th 2011 File:Eddie Gustafsson29.JPG ==References== *Red Bull Salzburg Homepage ==Other websites== * Eddie Gustafsson (Fangemeinschaft Red Bull Salzburg) Category:Swedish footballers Category:American association football goalkeepers Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:FC Red Bull Salzburg players Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia Category:Austrian football champions Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Eddie Gustafsson
